## Course Overview
This is the homepage for CSCI 200 - Introduction to Machine Learning taught by Prof. Kim Mandery in January 2026 at St. Olaf College. All course materials will be posted on this site.

You can find the course syllabus [here](course_information/syllabus.qmd) and the course schedule [here](course_information/schedule.qmd)

We will be using this [Moodle page](https://mdl.stolaf.edu/course/view.php?id=56310) to [submit assignments](https://mdl.stolaf.edu/course/section.php?id=1379416) and host our class [discussion forum](https://mdl.stolaf.edu/mod/forum/view.php?id=514243)
